I_y.description: Current of the synchronous machine in amperes (A)

PF.description: Power factor of the synchronous machine, a dimensionless number between 0 and 1

e_PF.description: Error in power factor of the synchronous machine, a dimensionless number between 0 and 1

d_if.description: Direct axis transient reactance in per unit (pu)

I_f.description: Field current of the synchronous machine in amperes (A)

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in power system analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the synchronous machine, please predict the field current (I_f).

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in power system analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the synchronous machine, please predict the rotor magnetic flux (d_if).
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted rotor magnetic flux (d_if) is __.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in power system analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the synchronous machine, please predict the reactive power factor (e_PF).
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted reactive power factor (e_PF) is __.
